section.title: What can I do with FlyMine?
section.para: Enter any identifier or symbol in the search box to access summary pages and integrated tools. Tutorial 1
Use the aspect icons below to find the types of data in FlyMine and to start queries.
Find lists of predefined template queries on each aspect page or use the Template Search box below. Tutorial 2
All queries in FlyMine can be performed on lists (or 'bags') that you create yourself.

Advanced users can use a flexible query interface to construct their own data mining queries or modify existing template queries. Start a query by choosing a class on an aspect page, browsing the model or viewing a list of all classes.
Save your queries and templates by creating an account. See the user manual and tutorials for more information.
